member.name: M:DevBin.API.PasteController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Fetch a paste information using its code
member.remarks: Raw paste content can be fetched from /raw/{code}

member.name: M:DevBin.API.PasteController.Post(DevBin.Models.UserPaste)
member.returns: Information about the newly created paste
member.remarks: Raw paste content can be fetched from /raw/{code}

member.name: M:DevBin.API.PasteController.Patch(System.String,DevBin.Models.UserPaste)
member.remarks: Raw paste content can be fetched from /raw/{code}

member.name: M:DevBin.API.PasteController.GetSyntaxes
member.summary: Get a list of available syntaxes

member.name: M:DevBin.API.PasteController.GetExposures
member.summary: Get a list of available exposures
member.remarks:
Available exposures
{ 1: Public 2: Unlisted 3: Private 4: Encrypted }

member.name: P:DevBin.DTO.Exposures.IsPublic
member.summary: Whether this exposure allows the paste to be publicly available

member.name: P:DevBin.DTO.Exposures.RegisteredOnly
member.summary: Whether this exposure allows the paste to be created only by registered users

member.name: P:DevBin.DTO.Exposures.AllowEdit
member.summary: Whether this exposure allows the paste to be modified by the owner

member.name: P:DevBin.DTO.Exposures.IsPrivate
member.summary: Whether this exposure allows the paste to be seen only to the owner

member.name: T:DevBin.Models.RemoteHost
member.summary: List of cached IP addresses for security purposes. Both IPv4 and IPv6
